Is the death note 23 days rule inconsistent? We all know about the 23 day rule. Well. I've been rewatching the series, and I've found something strange in episode 8...
At 4:10 (youtube) Light asks Ryuk if you can use any date, as long it's before the victims lifespan, to which Ryuk replies; yes
